description: A 1-minute de-risking session on The Rise of Parenting Experts.

hook.text: Type 'parenting advice' into Google and get 2 billion results. Most of them contradict each other.

discovery.text: For most of history, parenting knowledge was passed down through family and community, not experts.

quiz.question: What has the explosion of parenting advice done to parental confidence?
